short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays a notification with sound on page load. Works when any tab in a window finishes loading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that notifies you when a webpage finishes loading.
This extension saves your time by allowing you to do other things while a slow page is loading. 

Plays a notification with sound when any page finishes loading.
Click the extension icon to toggle whether sounds should be played.

Free and open source.

Releases:
https://github.com/willylin207/PageLoadAlarm/releases
